name: iollo
headline: At-home metabolomics test for healthy lifespan extension
description: iollo is an at-home metabolomics test to extend your healthy lifespan. We measure more than 500 biomarkers in blood and use AI to automatically match you with dietary, behavioral, and therapeutic interventions.
tags: industry:generative-ai; industry:health-tech; industry:biotech; industry:enterprise; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Gomari, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Daniel Gomari is the founder and CEO of iollo. He was previously a postdoctoral researcher at Stanford University where he led projects on healthy aging and lifespan extension. He received his PhD in Computational Biology, ​​where he built and applied machine learning methods for drug repurposing, with applications in cancer and diabetes patient metabolomics data.

Measure **500+ advanced biomarkers****in a single, convenient test for personalized****health and aging** insights into your:

  * Metabolic Health
  * Heart Health
  * Gut Microbiome Health
  * And 15+ more health areas

# Your journey in 4 steps

## Join us
Subscribe and order your kit. No requisition forms or lab visits required![**Get started now!**](https://www.iollo.com/</plans>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/625bed7943411f4eaacb73f1_icon-2.png)

Collect your sample from your arm, then return it with our pre-paid label. The collection device is CE marked and FDA registered. ‍
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/62dfe666ae912451052aca51_img-collect.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/625bef168b5f1e23ca70fa1e_icon-3.png)

Expect your personalized reports and recommendations within 3-5 weeks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/625bef212a1cf613d5a58c1b_icon-4.png)

Keep testing regularly for a deeper understanding of how changes impact your health.

# Learn what works for your health
#### Shape your health journey with personalized insights and recommendations based on your 500+ biomarkers.

# Learn habits that promote a healthier and longer life
#### Track your biomarker trends
See your 500+ biomarkers improve with healthy changes, and enjoy the benefits of better health.
#### Make changes that matter
Find foods, supplements, and lifestyle habits that work for you and benefit your long-term health.‍
#### Improve energy levels
Use your comprehensive biomarkers to maintain steady energy throughout the day and maximize your longevity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/663aff1198d727cc0c7e13f2_Group%20381.png)
[**Build Your Healthy Habits**](https://www.iollo.com/</plans>)

## Level up your health - our members' journeys
**Instant health insights** iollo has been priceless for my weight loss journey. Their targeted advice based on blood tests improved my fat burning efficiency, liver, and overall health. You also get instant and personalized feedback on your diet through your own 24/7 GPT-based health coach that gets better and better! I use it every day to track my diet.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/646eaa63c51366af956a4604_icon-start-rating.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/646eaa63c51366af956a4604_icon-start-rating.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/646eaa63c51366af956a4604_icon-start-rating.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/646eaa63c51366af956a4604_icon-start-rating.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/646eaa63c51366af956a4604_icon-start-rating.svg)

# Start your journey with us
### Learn how changes to your diet, physical activity, supplements, and sleep could shape your wellness and aging process.
[Start Now](https://www.iollo.com/</plans>)
how can we help?
# Frequently asked questions
For other questions feel free to [contact us](https://www.iollo.com/</contact>).
How do I collect my blood sample?
[You receive a sample collection device which seamlessly attaches to your arm. You then click the button on the device, and your sample will be painlessly collected into it. The entire process takes less than 5 minutes.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
1. Warm
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/62dfe64baa3eac209589b14e_img-warm.png)
2. Clean
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/62dfe65ac453647708c24d55_img-clean.png)
3. Collect
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/62dfe666ae912451052aca51_img-collect.png)
You then mail back the tube to our laboratory using the prepaid envelope provided and results are returned online. Detailed step-by-step instructions of the sample collection process are included in each test kit.
How is this different than traditional clinical labs?
[In traditional clinical labs, around 30 molecules are measured to assess your health, which looks at a narrow portion of your health. At iollo, we measure 500+ metabolite biomarkers for you in order to build a comprehensive picture of what is currently happening in your body.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
How is this different than gut microbiome-testing?
[A gut microbiome test looks at a person’s entire collection of microbes living inside their gut. As more research is being done in the field, it is becoming clearer that the metabolite biomarkers that these microbes produce that end up in the blood play a far more significant role in health than the gut microbiome composition alone. This means that to understand how your gut microbiome affects your health, it is essential to measure your blood metabolme.This is also the reason why only the metabolome can accurately predict your gut microbiome composition.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
Is my data secure?
[Data privacy is a top priority for us and we go above and beyond to protect your information. We are HIPAA compliant. We will never share your data without your consent, and will only do so for the advancement of research in health, metabolomics, and new personlized treatments. All of your protected health information (PHI) is encrypted and kept safe. Your information, results, and recommendations will never be shared with employers or insurance companies.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
What is metabolomics and my blood metabolome?
[Sugars like glucose, lipids like cholesterol, vitamins like vitamin B12, hormones like T3 and T4, are all metabolite biomarkers and we have so far identified 40,000+ of them in blood. The collection of all of these metabolite biomarkers are what is known as the blood metabolome.**‍** While your genetic makeup gives you risk scores that can be used to indicate what might happen, your metabolome indicates what is happening in your body right now. Also, only 15% of age-related diseases are genetic. The other 85% are related to your blood metabolome.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
How do you analyze results?
[We use the most advanced mass spectrometry technology to measure 500+ metabolite biomarkers from your blood sample and use state-of-the-art AI to create your personalized health report and recommendations.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
What can I do with my results?
[You can incorporate recommended lifestyle and nutritional changes, perform the recommended follow-up labs, schedule a telehealth consultation with a medical professional, and consult a medical professional to learn more about your results.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
How is this different than DNA-testing?
[Your genes do not change over your lifetime and while your genetic makeup gives you risk scores that can be used to indicate what might happen, your metabolome indicates what is happening in your body right now. Also, only 15% of age-related diseases are genetic. The other 85% are related to your blood metabolome.](https://www.iollo.com/<#>)
iollo is for anyone who wants to be empowered with information and data about their blood metabolome. iollo tests are intended exclusively for wellness purposes. iollo cannot provide you with medical advice or diagnose you with any disease or condition. Any information provided by iollo is not medical advice and is not intended to replace the advice of your medical professional.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61d984790bdf2970837c8d96/625c6b27564b153baca466ba_iollo-logo-footer.svg)](https://www.iollo.com/</>)

In traditional clinical labs, around 30 molecules are measured to assess your health, which looks at a narrow portion of your health. At iollo, we measure 500+ metabolite biomarkers for you in order to build a comprehensive picture of what is currently happening in your body.⟨15⟩
How is this different than gut microbiome-testing?
A gut microbiome test looks at a person’s entire collection of microbes living inside their gut. As more research is being done in the field, it is becoming clearer that the metabolite biomarkers that these microbes produce that end up in the blood play a far more significant role in health than the gut microbiome composition alone. This means that to understand how your gut microbiome affects your health, it is essential to measure your blood metabolme.This is also the reason why only the metabolome can accurately predict your gut microbiome composition.⟨15⟩
Is my data secure?
Data privacy is a top priority for us and we go above and beyond to protect your information. We are HIPAA compliant. We will never share your data without your consent, and will only do so for the advancement of research in health, metabolomics, and new personlized treatments. All of your protected health information (PHI) is encrypted and kept safe. Your information, results, and recommendations will never be shared with employers or insurance companies.⟨15⟩
What is metabolomics and my blood metabolome?
Sugars like glucose, lipids like cholesterol, vitamins like vitamin B12, hormones like T3 and T4, are all metabolite biomarkers and we have so far identified 40,000+ of them in blood. The collection of all of these metabolite biomarkers are what is known as the blood metabolome.**‍** While your genetic makeup gives you risk scores that can be used to indicate what might happen, your metabolome indicates what is happening in your body right now. Also, only 15% of age-related diseases are genetic. The other 85% are related to your blood metabolome.⟨15⟩
How do you analyze results?
We use the most advanced mass spectrometry technology to measure 500+ metabolite biomarkers from your blood sample and use state-of-the-art AI to create your personalized health report and recommendations.⟨15⟩
What can I do with my results?
You can incorporate recommended lifestyle and nutritional changes, perform the recommended follow-up labs, schedule a telehealth consultation with a medical professional, and consult a medical professional to learn more about your results.⟨15⟩
How is this different than DNA-testing?
Your genes do not change over your lifetime and while your genetic makeup gives you risk scores that can be used to indicate what might happen, your metabolome indicates what is happening in your body right now. Also, only 15% of age-related diseases are genetic. The other 85% are related to your blood metabolome.⟨15⟩
iollo is for anyone who wants to be empowered with information and data about their blood metabolome. iollo tests are intended exclusively for wellness purposes. iollo cannot provide you with medical advice or diagnose you with any disease or condition. Any information provided by iollo is not medical advice and is not intended to replace the advice of your medical professional.
![⟨16⟩](https://www.iollo.com/</>)

generated_description:
### iollo: A New Frontier in Metabolomics

#### Overview
iollo, founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, is a pioneering health-tech company that offers an at-home metabolomics test aimed at extending healthy lifespans. With a compact team of just three, it has already made waves as part of Y Combinator's Batch S22.

#### Mission
The company's mission is simple yet ambitious: to empower individuals with insights that can help enhance their health and longevity. iollo does this by measuring over 500 biomarkers in blood samples and employing AI to provide personalized recommendations on dietary, behavioral, and therapeutic interventions.

#### What They Offer
iollo simplifies health monitoring by allowing users to collect blood samples from the comfort of their homes. Here’s how it works:

1. **Subscription:** Users sign up and receive a kit with a pain-free collection device.
2. **Sample Collection:** Users collect a small blood sample and return it using a prepaid label.
3. **Insights Delivered:** Within 3-5 weeks, they receive personalized health reports, highlighting areas like biological age, metabolic health, heart health, and gut microbiome status.
4. **Continuous Improvement:** iollo encourages regular testing to track progress and adjust lifestyle changes based on data.

#### The Science Behind It
What sets iollo apart is its commitment to thoroughness. Traditional labs might analyze just 30 molecules, but iollo dives deeper, examining over 500 metabolites. This comprehensive approach enables users to gain a better understanding of their current health status—what's actually happening in their bodies—rather than just predictions based on genetic data.

#### Industry Insights
iollo has garnered attention not just for its innovative product, but also for the impressive background of its founding team, which includes experts from Stanford University. It’s tagged in sectors like generative AI, biotech, and health tech, indicating its broad reach in today's technology-driven health landscape.

#### User Testimonials
Customers rave about their experiences, citing tailored health insights that lead to real improvements in energy levels, weight management, and overall metabolic health. iollo is likened to a "wellness GPS" that guides users through their health journey with recommendations based on solid data.

#### Conclusion
iollo is more than just a health product; it's a new way of looking at personal health through the lens of metabolomics. As technology advances and awareness of personalized health grows, companies like iollo are poised to lead the charge in transforming how we understand and enhance our well-being. You can learn more about their services and start your journey at [iollo.com](https://www.iollo.com).
